data.title: Orders for ternary precursors and cobalt tetroxide are hot Green Midea reported revenue of more than 8 billion.
data.meta_description: On the evening of August 25, Grimmy (002340) disclosed that the company's operating income in the first half of the year was 8 billion yuan, an increase of 42.51% over the same period last year. The net profit of the company was 537 million yuan, an increase of 151.1% over the same period last year, and basic earnings per share were 0.11 yuan.
data.text:
On the evening of August 25th, Green Mei (002340) disclosed that the company's operating income in the first half of the year was 8 billion yuan, an increase of 42.51% over the same period last year, and its net profit was 537 million yuan, an increase of 151.1% over the same period last year.

The revenue of battery materials business in the first half of the year is 5.631 billion.

Greenmei said that the company's core products ternary precursors and cobalt tetroxide hot orders for the whole year, effectively promote the company's first half of the production capacity release, efficiency growth.

In the first half of the year, the shipment of ternary precursor materials of Grimme core products exceeded 42000 tons (sales revenue was 3.033 billion yuan), a sharp increase of 190% over the same period last year (sales revenue increased by 132.13%), ranking among the top three in the global market. Among them, the export of ternary precursor materials exceeded 15000 tons, an increase of more than 110 percent over the same period last year. The company shipped nearly 8500 tons of battery-grade cobalt tetroxide (sales revenue 1.782 billion yuan), an increase of 41.67% over the same period last year (sales revenue increased by 95.20%), ranking among the top three in the global market; the company shipped nearly 4900 tons of cathode materials, achieving stability and growth.

At the same time, with the rapid commercial use of new energy around the world, the power battery recycling industry will become the next tuyere industry. According to the statistics of the Ministry of Public Security, as of June 2021, the number of new energy vehicles in China has reached 6.03 million. The capacity of waste batteries to be recycled in China will reach 137.4GWhin 2025, more than five times that in 2020.

Grimmy also achieved rapid growth in power battery recycling business in the first half of the year, with operating revenue reaching 54.737 million yuan, an increase of 75.90% over the same period last year. Among them, cascade shipments of battery packs reached 11606 sets, an increase of 325% over the same period last year, and profitability continued to grow. The company shipped 2227 tons of ultra-fine cobalt powder, an increase of 65% over the same period last year.

The total production capacity of ternary precursors has reached 130000 tons per year.

Behind the growth in performance, Grimmy's production capacity is also increasing rapidly. As of June 2021, the total production capacity of the company's core products, ternary precursors, has reached 130000 tons per year. Under the competition pattern of the global industry market, the company's ternary precursors have comprehensively transformed and upgraded from 5-series and 6-series products to 8-series and above high-nickel products. 8-series and more than 8-series high-nickel products account for more than 50% of shipments, and 9-series ultra-high nickel (Ni90 and above) products account for more than 40% of sales. The upgrading of the product structure of ternary precursors has maintained the stability of the gross profit margin of the products, which is 25.63%, ranking first in the industry; cobalt tetroxide materials have been comprehensively transformed and mixed with high-voltage new-generation products, accounting for more than 50% of shipments.

In the first half of this year, Green Mei launched the development strategy of "Jingmen + Taixing + Fu'an" ternary precursor manufacturing base with one master and two pairs, and quickly built two ternary precursor manufacturing bases, Taixing and Fu'an. To achieve the goal of exceeding the total annual production capacity of 200000 tons of ternary precursors by the end of 2021 to ensure the production capacity of the company's ternary precursors market growth.

Grimm is also actively expanding the production capacity of battery-grade high-purity nickel cobalt salt crystals. On June 30th, the project with an annual output of 100000 tons of battery-grade high-purity nickel cobalt salt crystals (nickel sulfate, cobalt sulfate and cobalt chloride crystals) invested by Greenmei (Jingmen) High Purity Chemical Materials Co., Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the company, officially started construction. and will be completed and put into production this year.

In addition, in the first half of the year, Grammy further consolidated the power battery recycling system and base construction. Among them, Green Mei (Shenzhen) Shenzhen Shantou Circular economy Park Power Battery recovery Base and Tianjin Power Battery Recycling Base Construction, the base design capacity for recycling and disassembling 50,000 battery packages, the current production line has basically completed the installation, is expected to trial operation in September; In view of the huge new energy market in the Yangtze River Delta, the company signed Wuxi Power Battery low carbon Recycling Project Capital Cooperation with Wuxi Airport Economic Development Zone to build a Green Mei Wuxi New Energy Recycling economy low carbon demonstration Park. We will implement the construction of projects such as the annual recovery and treatment of 100000 new energy vehicles and the annual recovery and remanufacture of 100000 tons of power batteries. Further consolidate the company's power battery recycling and new energy vehicle recycling industry layout in the Pearl River Delta, Central China, Central Plains, Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei, Yangtze River Delta and other major regions, and form a new energy vehicle and power battery recycling industry system covering all parts of the company.

Battery Network noted that at present, Grimme has reached strategic cooperation with more than 350 vehicle factories and battery factories, such as Volkswagen, Daimler Mercedes-Benz, Toyota, Changan, Weilai, Weimar, Xiaopeng and so on. The company will also complete the construction of the power battery recycling base in Posco, South Korea in 2021, and actively lay out power battery recycling plants in Europe, build a global power battery recycling industry system, and greatly widen the gap between running and the industry. At present, the design has a total disassembly capacity of 450000 sets / year, actively creating a global leader in the comprehensive utilization of decommissioned power batteries.

The strength of technology and customers has been further improved.

While speeding up the layout of production capacity, Grimme was also further strengthening in the first half of the year in terms of patent layout, raw material protection, customer development, capital market, and so on.

In the first half of the year, Grammy invested more than 360 million yuan in R & D, an increase of 38.59 percent over the same period last year, accounting for more than 67 percent of the net profits attributed to shareholders of listed companies in the current period. The company has applied for a total of 2279 patents and led / participated in the revision of 299 national, industry and local group standards. In 2020, the company ranked 159th among the top 500 patent companies in China, up 56 places from 2019.

In terms of raw material security, in the first half of the year, Grimme enhanced its control over the Indonesian nickel resources project and acquired a 51% controlling stake in the Indonesian nickel resources project. It is reported that the Indonesian nickel resources project is scheduled to be completed in 2021 and put into operation in early 2022 to meet the strategic needs of nickel resources for the development of precursor materials in the company.

In terms of customers, Greenbeauty already has global well-known customer groups and strategic emerging industry high-quality customers, such as SAMSUNG SDI, ECOPRO, CATL, LGC, ATL, Umicore, Sandvik, Kennametal, BYD, China Minmetals, Rongbai Technology, Xiamen Tungsten Industry, etc., and fully participate in the division of labor and cooperation in the global core industrial chain, promoting Greenbeauty to become a listed company with outstanding global core competitive position and good efficiency.

In April this year, Grammy signed a memorandum with South Korea's ECOPRO BM to supply high-nickel precursors (NCA and NCM) for power batteries from 2021 to 2023. Greenmei will supply ECOPRO BM with a total of not less than 176000 tons of NCA&NCM high-nickel ternary precursor materials from 2021 to 2023, providing a strong international market guarantee for the implementation of the company's long-term goal of producing and selling 100000 tons of ternary precursors in 2021 and 400000 tons in 2025, and further establish the company's core position in the global market of high-nickel ternary precursor materials. Significantly increase the global market share of the company and both NCM high-nickel and NCA ternary materials.

In August this year, Green Mei successively signed a memorandum of cooperation with Yiwei Lithium Energy on directional recycling of 10000 tons of nickel products, and signed a strategic cooperation framework agreement with Funeng Technology on the construction of waste power batteries and battery waste green treatment industry chain. The cooperation with Yiwei Lithium Energy and Fuergy Technology marks the strategic upgrade of the company's new energy industry chain in the whole life cycle, directly opening up the green supply chain cooperation channel with new energy battery plants and new energy automobile plants, and establishing a deep cooperation relationship between power battery recycling and nickel and cobalt resources. It is helpful for the company to build a global power battery life cycle value chain of "power battery recycling-nickel-cobalt lithium battery raw material recycling-battery material recycling-power battery recycling" and the global green supply chain of nickel-cobalt products.

In terms of capital market, on July 23, Jiangxi Green Recycling Industry Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Grimme, made an initial public offering and its application for listing on the gem has been accepted by Shenzhen Stock Exchange. The spin-off and listing of e-waste with Green cycle as the main body is a major strategy for Grimm to achieve value enhancement and business upgrading, which marks the successful implementation of the company's dual-track drive strategy of "urban mines + new energy materials".
